attributes.action: Help me to open up a retreat for the families who need respite
attributes.additional_details: I have already set up a petition and have 324 signatures this really matters and feel if I couple open up a retreat for parents to have time out would make u huge difference
attributes.background: I have suffered from a young age and been given no help there is no real thought for what is families are going through which has led to mothers and fathers and careers mental health suffering to the point get don't feel the need to live

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It is not clear exactly what form of help you wish to be provided.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
